    • runProducerInNewThread

      public abstract void runProducerInNewThread(String id)
      Runs a producer in a separate Thread. Its properties are read within from origin folder
      Parameters:
      id - folder where properties files are

    • produce

      public abstract void produce(String id) throws IOException

      Parameters:
      id - If there are many files to read from
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getKey

      public String getKey(String path, String topic)
      Compose the key of the record to be sent to kafka by the producer. Counter use and incremented by 1 unit per record
      Parameters:
      path - of the file from we are reading
      topic - : kafka channel
      Returns:
      the key [fileName_topic_count] for the KStreamProducer object
